title: Where are the multimedia message attachments saved?
answer:
By default, after you receive a multimedia message, its attachment is automatically saved to the data folder, which is invisible to users. 

 You can save the attachment to the following locations. 

  [When the default storage location is your phone's internal storage, the attachment is saved to the Download folder under Files > Local > Internal storage.]() 

  [When the default storage location is the microSD card, the attachment is saved to the Download folder under Files > Local > SD card.]()
